scriptum.desc: Burkert's Lore. This work has been through revisions and reprints, so anything pointing to a library catalog is referring to the scriptum, not the work. One might be hard-pressed to come up with a clear work IRI.
Luckey, Mary. Membrane Structural Biology : With Biochemical and Biophysical Foundations. Cambridge ; New York: Cambridge University Press, 2008.
Gloria T. Delamar, Mother Goose: From Nursery to Literature. Jefferson, NC: McFarland, 1987.
